phrases: As we journeyed in search of Naraku's whereabouts,
three young monkey sprites appeared before us.
Clumsy, scatterbrained and quick to jump to conclusions...
The three monkey sprites were in search of
the sacred object which housed theirMonkey God.
We finally found it in a pickling tub being used as a weight.
And the Monkey God said something very strange.
A huge evil aura had flown overhead in the direction of the ox-tiger,
We know which way to go now!
She is supposed to come, too!
Kagome did not catch a cold because she wanted to.
This trip is going to be a long one.
We will use this time to get things ready.
I have to prep all my gadgets.
So your cold is actually a blessing, Kagome.
Kagome will recover quicker if Inuyasha is not around.
But it is a problem that Old Kaede is away.
Kagome, why do not you go home to the modern age?
There are good doctors there, right?
And you seem to have good medicine, too.
I am sorry, but I am going home for a bit.
Now come, Kagome... on my back!
Yes, she will be staying home again.
Oh no, it is just a cold.
It is for real this time...
This time, she has a cold.
Then I will make you something warm to drink.
It is been awhile since we saw her, yet she has a cold.
I wonder if it was cold back there?
She should take her time and recover completely.
Until now, she stayed home for all kinds of strange ailments.
She will not be hospitalized for a cold.
It will be nice to visit Kagome.
Are you going to Higurashi's house?
- Would you like to go visit her, too? - I see...
I wonder if he is going to see her?
Yes, but we have not done this in so long...
Inuyasha and the others are not here.
We must deal with it ourselves.
Get out of my way, punk!
What are you guys doing here?
Many demons have been acting up lately.
Some even terrorize areas where humans live.
It seems Naraku's disappearance caused all this.
The demons lay low while he is around.
Now they are doing as they please.
Did he come to save us?
Hmm... he is not that commendable.
Just who do you think I am?
I have business in this swamp.
Keep it up and I will swallow you head first!
I wonder if they escaped somewhere?
Even if it is just a cold, take care.
You have been so sickly lately, Kagome.
Does he come to visit you, too?
I heard you caught a cold.
So I came to pay you a visit.
I gave it a lot of thought.
I wondered just what I could do for you.
This is the only thing I could think of that is good foryour health.
These are charms for good health.
But ljust remembered that yourfamily owns a shrine.
Our charms do not work too well.
I think you should build up your strength.
Why do not you ask him in?
We thought she would get better care in her own home.
Where did you go without me?
Er... no... he is probably preparing forthe long journey.
I am sure I put it away in here.
The secret medicine passed down through generations of Higurashi.
It works on any and all illnesses!
Kagome's cold will be cured in a flash!
- Oh, Buyo! - I will have in ten minutes!
But now she has some visitors.
It became the talk of my class, too.
I will bet it is all over the school.
Well, ljust came to see how she was.
But Kagome's boyfriend is also kind.
Um... were you just talking about me?
There is someone who is been bothering Kagome.
Someone who will not even come to see her when she is sick!
Just came to see how you were.
But I am the only one able to come here.
I feel better, but my fever will not go down.
I am feeling a little tired, too.
l-I did not come here to take you back, y'know?
I wish you would confide in me more.
I will do whatever I can for you.
Since we are going out, it is the least...
Do not you think this will be on it?
And it is going to be used to determine our course of study.
Have you been studying during your absence?
Besides, she is noteven sure if she can make it to school tomorrow.
What will we be tested on?
You plan on taking the test when you are sick?
Is it okay for herto stay up?
There is an emphasis on math and science.
So you should memorize yourformulas and equations...
I will be seeing you, Higurashi.
What is the sense in taking a test if you don'tget overyour cold?
But once I am better, I will have to go to school.
Don'tget in the way of my studies!
I will make some rice gruel, so eat, okay?
We can sell it and make good money.
I do not think we should touch it.
I have not done a thing!
I did not touch a thing!
Fornourishment, there is nothing like liver!
Inuyasha, you are going to eat all that?
If you drink it, you will get better.
It will cure any cold in an instant!
It may taste bad, but it will work without fail.
If it will work, I will put up with the taste.
But how did you know about making such medicine?
Well, the ingredients are a little different.
Is that some kind of magic spell?
My motherused to do it long ago.
I will even pass the test!
I will be late even if I leave now!
I will not make it in time forthe test!
You will make it if you hurry?
I slept through the night, and I feel better.
Say, Inuyasha... I have to talk to you man-to-man.
I will do anything for my darling little brother!
Next on Inuyasha: Sota's Brave Confession of Love
This is way harderthan slaying demons!
